<!-- @name    sleep -->

# ```js sleep ```


Simple sleep function that can be used using "await" syntax in an "async" function

## Parameters

- **time**  Number: The sleep duration in ms



## Example (js)

```js
import sleep from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/function/sleep';
async function() {
 console.log('hello');
 await sleep(2000);
 console.log('World');
}
```
